com.newtouch.lion.service.system

接口 DepartmentService

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ExtendDepartmentService
    所有已知实现类:
    DepartmentServiceImpl, ExtendDepartmentServiceImpl

    public interface DepartmentService

    Title:部门管理Service类

    Description: 用于处理部门信息查询、更新、新增

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2012

    Company: Newtouch

    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    WangLijun
